name: lsx-starter-plugin
description: LSX Starter Plugin to kick start your WordPress Development

scripts.build-mopo: rm -R languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_EN.mo && cp languages/lsx-starter-plugin.pot languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_EN.po && wp i18n make-mo languages
scripts.translate-US: cp languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_EN.po languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_US.po && cp languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_EN.mo languages/lsx-starter-plugin-en_US.mo

author: LightSpeed
